system.description: Basic combat training for general self-defense.

levelDescriptions.1: 2 attacks per melee round. +2 to roll with punch/fall/impact, +2 to pull punch.
levelDescriptions.3: Kick attacks: Karate style kick does 2D4 damage or Snap Kick 1D6 damage.
levelDescriptions.6: Critical Strike on natural 19 or 20 (double damage).
levelDescriptions.10: +2 to pull punch and roll with impact.
levelDescriptions.13: Critical strike or knockout from behind.
